p: On the other hand, it is seen in Figure 9, that radiation is an important factor in P. amboinicus antioxidant activity since it is showed that when solar radiation levels are higher, EC 50 (represented by sample circles size) decreases, which means a better antioxidant activity. This result is corroborated with both Takshak et al. [ 53] and Takshak et al. [ 54] that showed an increase of antioxidant activity of Coleus forskohlii extracts when it was supplemented by UVB radiation. A similar result was observed to M. villosa through Figure 9.
